org.hps.recon.utils

Class TrackClusterMatcherNSigma

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.recon.utils.AbstractTrackClusterMatcher
      • org.hps.recon.utils.TrackClusterMatcherNSigma
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TrackClusterMatcher

    public class TrackClusterMatcherNSigma
extends AbstractTrackClusterMatcher
    Utility used to determine if a track and cluster are matched.

      • snapToEdge

        private boolean snapToEdge
        Rafo's parameterization of cluster-seed x/y position residuals as function of energy. Derived using GBL/seed tracks, non-analytic extrapolation, uncorrected cluster positions, and EngRun2015-Nominal-v4-4-fieldmap detector. f = p0+e*(p1+e*(p2+e*(p3+e*(p4+e*p5))))

      • debug

        boolean debug

      • snapper

        SnapToEdge snapper

      • setUseAnalyticExtrapolator

        public void setUseAnalyticExtrapolator(boolean useAnalyticExtrapolator)
        Use the analytic track extrapolator i.e. the no fringe extrapolator. The field map extrapolator is used by default.
        Parameters:
        useAnalyticExtrapolator - Set to true to use the analytic extrapolator, false otherwise.

      • getNSigmaPosition

        public double getNSigmaPosition(Cluster cluster,
                                ReconstructedParticle particle)
        Calculate #sigma between cluster-track x/y position at calorimeter. Based on Rafo's parameterizations. Requires non-analytic extrapolation and uncorrected cluster positions.
        Parameters:
        cluster - = position-uncorrected cluster
        particle - recon particle with tracks
        Returns:
        #sigma between cluster and track positions

      • getNSigmaPosition

        public double getNSigmaPosition(Cluster cluster,
                                Track track,
                                double p)

      • isMatch

        public boolean isMatch(Cluster cluster,
                       Track track)
        Determine if a track is matched to a cluster. Currently, this is determined by checking that the track and cluster are within the same detector volume of each other and that the extrapolated track position is within some defined distance of the cluster.
        Parameters:
        cluster - : The Ecal cluster to check
        track - : The SVT track to check
        Returns:
        true if all cuts are pased, false otherwise.

      • matchTracksToClusters

        public HashMap<Track,Cluster> matchTracksToClusters(EventHeader event,
                                                    List<List<Track>> trackCollections,
                                                    List<Cluster> clusters,
                                                    StandardCuts cuts,
                                                    int flipSign,
                                                    boolean useCorrectedClusterPositionsForMatching,
                                                    boolean isMC,
                                                    HPSEcal3 ecal,
                                                    double beamEnergy)
        Return Map of Tracks with matched EcalCluster. Tracks are not matched to unique Clusters, and the same Cluster may be matched to different Tracks. If Track is not matched to a Cluster, Map value set to null
        Specified by:
        matchTracksToClusters in interface TrackClusterMatcher
        Specified by:
